hey, phatfish (this name speaks volumes) the comments are not for you to opine on the content of the movie but to let others know the quality of the rip itself.  Opinions vary, everyone's got one and we all know the rest...some people like a mindless comedy now and again. every movie doesn't have to be an award winner - it's FREE, you wanker.
